name: Malware (Radsy)
description:
The website promised that the program is not only an antivirus, but it also sends e-mail, schedules appointments, AND tells jokes. Will your new buddy help you free up space on your virus-riddled computer?

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

Space Bar - Jump

S - Pick Up Item

Q - Interact

W - Enter Door

Left Shift - Enlarge

Left Ctrl - Shrink

Left Mouse Click (When close to crate) - Grab Crate

Whilst holding Crate - A and D to move with Crate

Left Mouse Click again (When close to crate) - Let go of Crate
